title: Jordan lui piaha kan inkhawm hunah
lyrics:
Jordan lui piaha kan inkhawm hunah,
Chhandamte ropuiin kan hmu ang;
Luipui kama tiau chhiar sen loh zat ang,
Ennawm mak tak chu kan la hmu ang.

Luipui kama tiau chhiar sen loh zat ang,
Lui kama tiau chhiar sen loh zat ang;
Ennawm tak a ni ang,
Chhandamte kan hmuh hunah,
Luipui kama tiau chhiar sen loh zat ang mai!

Leilung piantirh ata chhandamte chuan,
Lungngaihna leh thlemna na ngam ta;
Khitah khian inhmuin kan intawk ang,
Ennawm mak tak chu kan la hmu ang.

Chumi lui kama kan din ve hunah,
Nunna thing daihlimah kan awm ang;
Kanan ram mawi tak lam kan thlir ang a,
Ennawm mak tak chu kan la hmu ang.

Kan Chhandamtu tak leh a ropuina,
Chiang takin amah kan hmuh hunah,
Lalin khawvel zawng zawng ro a rel ang,
Ennawm mak tak chu kan la hmu ang.
